definition: equator (of the earth or astronomical body)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The Maldives comprises the equator and has a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 馬爾代夫位於赤道附近，屬熱帶氣候。

sentences.english: In June the equatorial trade winds reversed direction from westward to eastward.
sentences.chinese: 六月赤道信風相反的方向從西到東。

sentences.english: Canada is north of the equator.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大是在池袋赤道的北部。

sentences.english: At its furthest point from the Equator, what latitude is Singapore situated at, approximately?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡離赤道最遠點處，其緯度大約是多少？

sentences.english: Water tends to move from the poles toward equator .
sentences.chinese: 因而水會傾向於由極區往赤道地區移動。

sentences.english: So Equator East Pacific SSTA and the IOD have synergic effect.
sentences.chinese: 赤道東太平洋海溫異常和印度洋偶極子有協同作用。

sentences.english: Heavy rains are a feature of weather near the equator.
sentences.chinese: 常下大雨是赤道附近天氣的一個特徵。

sentences.english: Mountain forests in the tropics have a cool climate throughout the year, usually without seasons.
sentences.chinese: 赤道高山雨林裏，常年涼爽，沒有季節的變化。

sentences.english: One or two bivalents were not on the equatorial plate.
sentences.chinese: 個別二價體也不排列在赤道板上。

sentences.english: Because of this, the Coriolis force is not in effect at the equator.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲如此，科氏力，在赤道上不發揮作用。

sentences.english: A constellation in the equatorial region of the Southern Hemisphere near Aquarius and Eridanus.
sentences.chinese: 鯨魚座南半球赤道地區靠近寶瓶座與波江座的星座。

sentences.english: A photographic equatorial mount capable of reasonable accurate tracking of the RA-axis.
sentences.chinese: 一個可以有相當赤經追蹤精確度的攝星用赤道儀。

sentences.english: In this from the equator very near the sun and flower lets a person feel dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 在這離赤道很近的地方陽光和鮮花一樣讓人發暈。

sentences.english: The models show more warming near the equator and on the western side of the ocean basin.
sentences.chinese: 氣候模型顯示在赤道和海洋的西面會有更多的熱量。

sentences.english: A person who lives at the Equator is in accelerated motion due to the earth's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 住在赤道的人由於地球自轉的緣故做加速運動。

sentences.english: The Nonlinear Interaction of Barotropic and Equatorial Baroclinic Rossby Waves.
sentences.chinese: 正壓和赤道斜壓羅斯貝波的非線性相互作用。

definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
the two poles/the north and south poles/both ends of sth/electric or magnetic poles
